vstore.framework.utils

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • vstore.framework.utils.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Some utilities for working with files on the filesystem.

      Prevent instantiation.

    • Method Detail

      • moveFile

        public static java.io.File moveFile(java.io.File inputFile,
                                    java.io.File outputPath,
                                    java.lang.String outputName)
        Moves the given file to the output path.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - The file to move.
        outputPath - The path where to put the file.
        outputName - The name of the output file (can be null, then the original name is used).
        Returns:
        true if the move was successful

      • copyFile

        public static java.io.File copyFile(java.io.File inputFile,
                                    java.io.File outputPath,
                                    java.lang.String outputName)
        Copies the given file to the given output path.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - The file to copy.
        outputPath - The path to which to save the file.
        outputName - The name of the output file (can be null, then the original name is used).
        Returns:
        The object of the new file if successful. If not, null.

      • copyFileFromInputStream

        private static java.io.File copyFileFromInputStream(java.io.FileInputStream in,
                                                    java.lang.String inputFileName,
                                                    java.io.File outputPath,
                                                    java.lang.String outputName)
        Copies a file fro the input stream to the given output path with the given output name. The given file input stream will not be closed.
        Parameters:
        in - The file input stream to copy data from.
        inputFileName - The filename of the input file.
        outputPath - The output path where to save the new file.
        outputName - The name of the new file.
        Returns:
        A File object containing a reference to the path of the created file.

      • writeStringToFile

        public static java.io.File writeStringToFile(java.lang.String s,
                                             java.io.File outputPath,
                                             java.lang.String outputName)
        Writes the given String to the given file in the given output path. Creates necessary directories on the way to output path if they do not exist.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to write to the file.
        outputPath - The path where the output file should be created.
        outputName - The name of the output file.
        Returns:
        The file object referencing the created file.

      • readStringFromFile

        public static java.lang.String readStringFromFile(java.io.File inputFile)
        Reads the given file into a string and returns it.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - The file to read.
        Returns:
        The resulting string, or null.

      • deleteFile

        public static void deleteFile(java.io.File file)
        Deletes the given file if it exists.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to delete.

      • getMimeType

        public static java.lang.String getMimeType(java.lang.String filename)
        Returns the MIME type of a file based on the file's extension.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the file including the file extension.
        Returns:
        Null, if no file extension available. Otherwise, the MIME type corresponding to the file extension.
